extendedInfo.description: If you are seeking answers about the Christian faith this app is a good place to start.It provides a starting point to answering such questions as:- is there a God?- why does God allow suffering?- who is Jesus?- why did He die on a cross?- is the Bible really true?- is there hope for the hopeless?- can I be too bad to be saved?......and many more.Serious questions raised by atheists, scientists or those simply seeking answers to life are addressed in a clear and sympathetic way.This app will be updated on a regular basis and users are encouraged to request further free resources in their quest for answers about the Christian faith.
